CustomProperties.Name: Margin
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Used to create space around elements, outside of any defined borders.

CustomProperties.Name: HintText
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Light-grey text that appears in an input-text control if it's empty.

CustomProperties.Name: OnSelect
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Behaviour run when clicking or selecting the visual.

CustomProperties.Name: DisplayMode
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Visual and interaction state of the control.
